roleset.name: selling

role.descr: attribute of arg1, marketed as what

roles.note: Avoid instances that refer to the location, aka the marketplace. Tagged instances should be able to be construed as referring to an event.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, market-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: TMP
example.text: I did a quick ebay search using " Marshall style " and came up with 100's of listings that use that term for after market parts and kits .
